issue.title: [Python] ChunkedArray.to_numpy
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9429](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9429). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently one needs to construct a `pandas.Series` and call `values` to get a numpy array as a result of `ChunkedArray`. We should provide a simpler `to_numpy` function that doesn't construct the `pandas.Series` overhead.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9429?focusedCommentId=17174306) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7868
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7868>
